channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Is AI Right For Your SMB? Consider These Five Points First
item.description: It’s important to keep things in perspective and understand that AI, while powerful, may not always meet expectations.
